column1: Smoque BBQ////What is this place that the BBQ gods have bestowed upon us? The best I've had yet.  A true carnivore
column2: i ask for more meat instead of sides and Smoque has never ever let me down.  The brisket is something special.  The pulled pork
column3: amazing. I want some now.   If you don't need to stay then order ahead
column4: stop and buy some beer and be the envy of everyone when you go straight to the front of the line.  In and out in 10 with a line out the door. Go home and make a pig out of yourself.  (No pun intended)  That's wassup!
